summary: This adds a camel by Whiterun Stables for the Player Character to ride. This is mostly a modders resource so feel free to add the camel to your mod(s). The camel has a saddle and harness.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Camel
Author: Edhildil
6,7,2015
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

This adds a camel by Whiterun Stables for the Player Character to ride. This

is mostly a modders resource so feel free to add the camel to your mod(s). The

camel has a saddle and harness.

The eyelashes act strange when it blinks, I tried to weight it to zero to

remove the issue but something isn't behaving. Its not a huge deal, but it

seems to stretch too far when the eyes close (minor).

The player seems to ride somewhat low but when I equip the dawnguard crossbow

the character raises to the correct height for some reason, not sure why this

is happening.

mods in screenshots include:

My character:

Hair: Apachii SkyHair female pack
Skin: Sporty Sexy Sweat, SG Textures Renewal CBBE
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty
Armor: Edhildils Dominatrix and purelust outfits
       Edhildils Bikini
       Hammerfell outfit from Edhildils Personal Clothing

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

None at this time.

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Skyrim

 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



Uninstallation:

Delete Data_meshes__edhildil_camel folder
Delete Data_textures_armor_edhildil_camel folder
Delete Edhildils Camel esp. file


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]


Edhildil for the camel and saddle
 

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed

in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so

I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
